WorkItem.Description:
Hi, 

I used OOP XML Parser ImportX12 to generate a SQL database from x12 file. Based on business rules I modified the database to modify/remove segments. Now I need to generate the output x12 file to be sent to business, how do I do that? Is there a way to do that in this tool?
WorkItem.Summary: Generate x12 file from SQL Database
